text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly cites and details the content of s. 76(6) of the Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008 within the 'Statutory Basis' section, stating: \"S.76(6) - In assessing reasonableness of force, account must be taken that 'a person acting for a legitimate purpose may not be able to weigh to a nicety the exact measure of any necessary action'\".", "criterion_id": "2bc01107-d10e-487f-89ac-7cb0d7c67d08"}
